title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, push, list, delete models via simple Python client.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node and browsers (via proxy).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat backend.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface) with model management, chats, and multi-user support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI wrapper with chat history, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented generation example using Ollama embeddings + llama-index.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Visual Studio Code extension that brings Ollama models as a free local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that chats, generates images, and moderates using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n node to call Ollama models inside no-code workflows (chat, generate, embed).

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir OTP client for Ollama with GenServer-backed connection pooling and LiveView hooks.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger pipeline example that downloads, quantizes, and serves models with Ollama in CI.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri-based desktop GUI for Ollama written in Rust with tray icon and auto-launch.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds AI-assisted autocomplete, summarization, and chat using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official NPM package providing JavaScript/TypeScript bindings to Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama PyPI
summary: Official Python package on PyPI for interacting with Ollama servers; install via pip install ollama.
